translation.zh: 洋葱蘸酱充满塞内加尔的风味

translation.zh: 有个向导跟我说了些典故

translation.zh: “你知道当年他们都吃些什么吗？”

translation.zh: 他说祖先们必须重达60公斤

translation.zh: 所以为了增加体重 他们会吃…

translation.zh:
他们吃来增加体重的食物

translation.zh: 于是就有了“阿卡拉”这道菜

translation.zh: 这是向祖先致敬的美意

translation.zh: 克里奥尔人都与非洲的祖先息息相关

translation.en: I travel with Michelle Joan Papillion to Edgard, Louisiana,
translation.zh:
我和米歇尔·琼·巴比隆
循着运河前往路易斯安那州埃德加

translation.en: on a canal that has been owned by Matthew Rousseve's family
translation.zh: 这条运河自1850年代起

translation.en: since the late 1850s.
translation.zh: 就归马修·鲁塞夫家族所有

translation.en: The grasslands and bayous of Louisiana
translation.zh: 路易斯安那州的草地和长沼

translation.en: have fed families for generations.
translation.zh: 供养着家族世世代代

translation.en: [Michelle] For many, many, many generations,
translation.zh: 世世代代

translation.en: we have been farming and cultivating the land,
translation.zh:
我们家族都以务农为本
单单耕作土地、养殖畜牧

translation.en: ranching, pretty much everything you need to be sufficient.
translation.zh:
我们家族都以务农为本
单单耕作土地、养殖畜牧 就足以自给自足

translation.en: My grandmother, she learned how to fish when she was a little girl
translation.zh: 我奶奶从小就学会钓鱼

translation.en: and her job kind of became the one of going out and gathering the fish for the family.
translation.zh: 外出为家人钓鱼俨然成为她的责任

translation.en: They were farmers. They were growing things in the garden,
translation.zh: 他们一家都务农 在园地里耕作

translation.en: they had their crops, and she would go to the lake
translation.zh: 种植谷类作物 她也会跑到湖泊钓鱼

translation.en: in order to sustain the family and feed the family.
translation.zh: 只为了养活一家大小

translation.en: And that was a daily practice.
translation.zh: 那是她的日常作息

translation.en: The water for her was just as much second nature as being on the farm.
translation.zh: 河道和农地都是她熟悉不过的地方

translation.en: And we had old-school bamboo sticks, like,
translation.zh: 我们采用传统钓鱼手法

translation.en: for our fishing poles.
translation.zh: 用竹枝充当鱼竿

translation.en: What kind of fish were you catching?
translation.zh: 钓哪种鱼？

translation.en: We caught snapper, buffalo, perch.
translation.zh: 我们钓鲷鱼、水牛鱼和河鲈

translation.en: We had trout.
translation.zh: 鳟鱼

translation.en: Um. We had bass.
translation.zh: 海鲈

translation.zh: 作为在亚特兰大长大市长大的孩子

translation.en: I didn't have to think about where our groceries came from.
translation.zh:
我没必要去设想
超市里的食材从哪里来

translation.en: For Michelle and Matt's families,
translation.zh: 但米歇尔和马修的家人

translation.en: they had to rely on the bayou as their source for what fed them.
translation.zh: 必须仰赖长沼为他们提供食物来源

translation.en: [Matthew] The name of this canal is Stump Canal.
translation.zh: 这条运河叫“树桩运河”

translation.en: I see why they call it Stump Canal.
translation.zh: 看得出为什么叫“树桩运河”

translation.en: Yeah, they got stumps in here.
translation.zh: 对啊 因为到处都是树桩

translation.en: In the wintertime, you catch a lot of sacalait.
translation.zh: 冬天可以抓到很多花鲈

translation.en: Right now, you catch a lot of perch in here. A lot of perch.
translation.zh: 这段时期可以抓到大量花鲈

translation.en: [Stephen] Living off the Louisiana coast
translation.zh: 倚靠路易斯安那州沿海资源生存

translation.en: seems to be an important aspect of Creole culture.
translation.zh:
似乎是克里奥尔文化中
不可或缺的一环

translation.en: I got some docile-looking crickets for you.
translation.zh: 我给你准备了一些楚楚可怜的蟋蟀

translation.en: [Matthew] That's what we're talking about.
translation.zh: 这才像话嘛

translation.en: [Stephen] Matt and his family still live off these waters today,
translation.zh: 马修和他的家人至今仍傍水而居

translation.en: fishing in them weekly for dinner.
translation.zh: 每周在河上垂钓晚餐的食材

translation.en: I've been fishing this canal over 30 years or longer.
translation.zh: 我在这条河道上垂钓超过30年了

translation.en: -Incredible. -Oh wow.
translation.zh: 真不可思议

translation.en: I know where the fish are at every time of the year.
translation.zh:
每年不同时节
我都知道鱼儿在哪里逗留

translation.en: Now let's see. See right here. It looks like they got something…
translation.zh: 我瞧瞧 在那边 看起来有动静

translation.en: -You're casting that line right there. -Right here by this stump.
translation.zh:
-你把鱼线抛到那边去了
-在树桩旁

translation.en: -By that stump. -Watch this.
translation.zh:
-在树桩旁
-看好

translation.en: -I can see the fish underneath the water. -Watch.
translation.zh:
-我能看到水底的鱼
-看好

translation.en: We're gonna find him. He's somewhere here.
translation.zh: 我们要找到它 它就在附近

translation.en: -There he is. Look. -There he go. Right there.
translation.zh:
-上钩了 你们看
-很好 在那边

translation.en: -There he is. Nice one. Look. -[Stephen] Oh!
translation.zh: 上钩了 不错 你们看

translation.en: -Yeah. Perch outta the water. -Just like that!
translation.zh:
-花鲈上钩了
-轻易上钩

translation.en: -[Michelle] Whoa! That's a beautiful one. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-好漂亮的花鲈
-是啊

translation.en: Perch outta the water. We got one here.
translation.zh: 花鲈上钩了 钓到一条鱼了

translation.en: [Stephen] Being on these waters with the locals
translation.zh: 跟至今仍倚靠土地自给自足的当地人

translation.en: who are still living and feeding off the land is humbling.
translation.zh:
一起在河道上穿行
是一种洗尽铅华的体验

translation.en: It's a reminder for me that owning land can provide food, shelter, and stability
translation.zh:
让我再次意识到
拥有土地能为未来世世代代

translation.en: for many generations to come.
translation.zh: 提供饮食、住所和安稳的生活

translation.en: As I continue to explore the land that gave us Creole food…
translation.zh:
在持续探索
克里奥尔饮食文化来源地的路上

translation.en: I cannot escape the complicated history
translation.zh: 我无法忽视埋在这片土地下

translation.en: of Black labor buried in the soil.
translation.zh: 错综复杂的黑奴历史

translation.en: Even after emancipation and reconstruction,
translation.zh: 即便在1800年代到1900年代期间

translation.en: in the late 1800s and early 1900s,
translation.zh: 经历解放和重建

translation.en: many Black families were bound to the plantation still,
translation.zh: 许多非裔家庭仍旧离不开种植园

translation.en: working as farmers, doing 100% of the labor,
translation.zh: 他们继续务农 包揽全部劳力活

translation.en: but paid for only a portion of the profits.
translation.zh: 赚取微薄的收益

translation.en: An unbalanced work exchange known as sharecropping,
translation.zh: 这种不平衡的收入分成叫“佃农制”

translation.en: a system that wasn't fully phased out
translation.zh: 一直到1960年代

translation.en: until the 1960s.
translation.zh: 佃农制才被逐步淘汰

translation.en: I travel to a Louisiana plantation to meet with Mr. Elvin Shields,
translation.zh:
我来到路易斯安那州某个种植园
会见艾尔文·西尔德斯

translation.en: a retired mechanical engineer who grew up as a sharecropper.
translation.zh:
他是个退休机械工程师
小时候曾是个佃农

translation.en: -How are you doing, Mr. Shields? -Super.
translation.zh:
-西尔德斯先生 你好吗？
-很好

translation.en: -Good deal. -Super.
translation.zh:
-不错嘛
-很好

translation.en: I wanted to ask you about your own personal story,
translation.zh: 我想了解你的个人成长经历

translation.en: where you grew up, and how you grew up.
translation.zh: 想知道你在哪里长大、怎么长大

translation.en: I grew up on Cane River Plantation.
translation.zh: 我在凯恩河种植园长大

translation.en: In a sharecropping family.
translation.zh: 出生佃农家庭

translation.en: [Stephen] Can you tell me a little bit more about what it meant
translation.zh: 可以跟我解释一下

translation.en: to be a sharecropper
translation.zh: 在1940年代到1959年代期间

translation.en: growing up in the '40s and '50s?
translation.zh: 身为“佃农”意味着什么吗？

translation.en: You were given five/six hundred square feet slave cabin.
translation.zh:
园主提供一间
150到180平方米的奴隶小屋

translation.en: And you were given
translation.zh: 再提供一片

translation.en: about another half an acre to plant your personal crops,
translation.zh:
2000平方米的土地
我们可以种植谷物

translation.en: raise some chickens, raise a couple of pigs.
translation.zh: 养鸡养猪

translation.en: It was basically hand-to-mouth. You had no money.
translation.zh:
我们只能勉强度日
毕竟我们身上没钱

translation.en: We had nothing but labor.
translation.zh: 什么都没有 只有劳力

translation.en: What kind of labor were your family participating in?
translation.zh: 你家人从事哪种农活？

translation.en: -Of course, you were picking cotton. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 我们自然是采收棉花

translation.en: And that means sunup to sundown,
translation.zh: 意味着从日出到日落都在干活

translation.en: and you're basically agreeing on half.
translation.zh: 我们严格上只取得半数收益

translation.en: Half of the profit was for you,
translation.zh: 一半收益给我们

translation.en: and other half was for the landowner.
translation.zh: 一半收益给园主

translation.en: However, if you didn't have mews,
translation.zh: 然而 我们没有仓库

translation.en: you didn't have plows,
translation.zh: 没有犁

translation.en: you didn't have wagons,
translation.zh: 没有拖拉车

translation.en: you have to rent that from the plantation owner.
translation.zh: 必须向园主租借

translation.en: So, as soon as that happened,
translation.zh: 缴付租金后

translation.en: your half became a third.
translation.zh: 半数收益只剩三分之一

translation.en: -You see what happened? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 看到是什么情况吗？

translation.en: And so, at the end of the year, you broke even.
translation.zh: 因此到了年尾 只得了个不亏不赚

translation.en: Maybe.
translation.zh: 我想是吧

translation.en: [Stephen] What Mr. Shields is describing doesn't feel like actual freedom,
translation.zh:
按照西尔德斯先生的描述
祖先并没有得到真正的自由

translation.en: at least not to me.
translation.zh: 起码我是这么想的

translation.en: Sharecroppers, despite the unjust contract with landowners,
translation.zh: 虽然佃农跟园主签下不公平的协议

translation.en: clearly had to find a way to feed themselves and their family.
translation.zh:
但他们也找到了
自食其力和养家糊口的方法

translation.en: Every plantation had their own store.
translation.zh: 每个种植园都有专属的仓库

translation.en: During the year, you didn't have any cash until the crop come in.
translation.zh: 谷物收成前 我们整年都没有收入

translation.en: So they would give you credit,
translation.zh: 这时园主便会提供贷款

translation.en: and they would sell you stuff out of the store.
translation.zh: 然后拿仓库里的东西卖给我们

translation.en: And so you would buy flour,
translation.zh: 于是我们会买些面粉

translation.en: you would buy meal, sugar,
translation.zh: 谷物粗粉、糖

translation.en: and it would make up something called cornbread kush.
translation.zh: 做一种谷物糊

translation.en: Cornbread kush.
translation.zh: 谷物糊

translation.en: Yeah, you would take some oil, lard, -which is from your hog. -Um-hmm.
translation.zh:
用适量的油、动物脂肪
通常是指猪油

translation.en: When you made the crackling, you took the grease off,
translation.zh: 炸猪皮时 将榨出的猪油取出

translation.en: and you would put in a pan, and you would take the meal,
translation.zh:
将猪油放在平底锅上
另外备好谷类粗粉

translation.en: and you'd put some water in and whip it up like you're gonna make a cake.
translation.zh: 加些水搅拌 就像做蛋糕糊一样

translation.en: But then, when the grease gets hot, you dump it in the pan,
translation.zh: 油加热后 将面糊倒进平底锅里

translation.en: your black skillet, and you stir it all up.
translation.zh: 也就是黑皮铁铸锅 接着搅拌面糊

translation.en: Either put some sugar on top, a little molasses on top,
translation.zh: 在上面放点糖 放点糖蜜

translation.en: and pour some milk, and that was your cereal.
translation.zh: 倒入适量的牛奶 谷物糊就做好了

translation.en: Okay. That was the kind of thing you ate. A lot of that. But that is what we got.
translation.zh:
那就是我们以前常吃的食物
当时就只有这些食材

translation.en: Whatever they found at the cheapest price,
translation.zh: 园主认为价格低廉的东西

translation.en: they put it on the shelf for the sharecroppers.
translation.zh: 都会拿出来卖给佃农

translation.en: [Stephen] Common staples of a slave diet included cornmeal, pork, and molasses,
translation.zh:
谷物糊、猪肉和糖蜜
是黑奴的日常饮食

translation.en: which is pretty close to the diet that Mr. Shields ate almost 100 years later.
translation.zh:
跟100年后
西尔德斯先生的日常饮食相近

translation.en: What were the differences between the period of slavery
translation.zh: 奴役时期和重建时期的佃农

translation.en: and this reconstruction period of sharecropping?
translation.zh: 有哪些分别？

translation.en: The difference in the period was that you didn't have gang labor.
translation.zh: 分别是佃农时期没有生产监管制

translation.en: You were an independent contractor.
translation.zh: 我们是独立承包人

translation.en: You now could have some kind of… pride.
translation.zh: 持有某种尊严

translation.en: This cotton, I raised it.
translation.zh: “这些棉花是我们种的”

translation.en: The profits from it… is part mine,
translation.zh: “部分收益是我的”

translation.en: no matter how small.
translation.zh: 无论收益多寡

translation.en: And you thought sharecropping was going to last forever.
translation.zh: 我们以为佃农制会一直持续下去

translation.en: Until mechanization came.
translation.zh: 直到机械出现为止

translation.en: And what happened then?
translation.zh: 接着发生了什么事？

translation.en: They didn't need us anymore.
translation.zh: 园主再也不需要我们了

translation.en: This cotton machine came
translation.zh: 采棉机出现

translation.en: to pick the cotton, and then people were asked to leave.
translation.zh:
代替劳力采摘棉花
彩棉工纷纷遭到解雇

translation.en: And you're waiting your turn to get the knock on the door.
translation.zh: 我们天天都在等园主来敲门宣布

translation.en: "Can you be out Wednesday?"
translation.zh: “可以周三离开吗？”

translation.en: After hundreds of years, you were asked to leave.
translation.zh: 住在种植园几百年后 我们被迫离开

translation.en: "And no, you can't borrow my wagon to haul your stuff."
translation.zh: “我们不能借出马车帮你们搬家

translation.en: "And I don't have anywhere to put you."
translation.zh: 也没地方安置你们”

translation.en: To me, that seems cruel,
translation.zh: 在我看来 这种做法很残忍

translation.en: and to me, that seems like actually
translation.zh: 我也觉得…

translation.en: these plantation owners, because again,
translation.zh: 这些园主…毕竟…

translation.en: we're talking about decades after slavery is over,
translation.zh: 这已经是奴役时期结束十几年后

translation.en: so what they're also holding on to
translation.zh: 园主仍然…

translation.en: is the power to be able to say,
translation.zh: 有权说

translation.en: "You need to be out on Wednesday."
translation.zh: “你们必须在周三离开”

translation.en: They have… There's no humanity still.
translation.zh: 他们…这种行为依然不人道

translation.en: There's no respect.
translation.zh: 缺乏对生命的尊重

translation.en: We were working the land,
translation.zh: 土地是我们耕作的

translation.en: and we were living on the land.
translation.zh: 我们也住在那片土地上

translation.en: That's all we knew.
translation.zh: 我们只知道这么多

translation.en: And you were forced off the land.
translation.zh: 结果我们被迫离开那片土地

translation.en: -Where are you going? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 何去何从？

translation.en: Yeah, we lost so much.
translation.zh: 对啊 我们失去了很多

translation.en: We lost so much there.
translation.zh: 我们失去了很多

translation.en: So as families moved to the city,
translation.zh: 家家户户搬到城里后

translation.en: then the government come along and say,
translation.zh: 政府提出倡议

translation.en: "We're gonna build a bunch of government houses to put you in."
translation.zh: “我们要兴建公共住房安置你们”

translation.en: Then the government are going into the worst part of town,
translation.zh: 接着政府选一块城里最落后的地区

translation.en: building a whole lot of government projects.
translation.zh: 兴建大量公共住房

translation.en: And creating… a ghetto.
translation.zh: 由此生出贫民窟

translation.en: That's why when I drive through Plantation Country, I see my home.
translation.zh:
每次开车经过种植园
我仿佛看见了自己的家园

translation.en: This is what we created as a Black people,
translation.zh: 但这是我们同胞打造的园地

translation.en: even though we don't own it and nobody's gonna share it with us.
translation.zh:
即便我们不是园主
也没人愿意跟我们分享土地

translation.en: But it's ours.
translation.zh: 但这些土地是我们的

translation.en: As a Black person, we're on a plantation.
translation.zh: 如今我们两个非裔来到了种植园

translation.en: When I hear the word plantation,
translation.zh: 每次听到“种植园”这个词

translation.en: it makes me uncomfortable
translation.zh: 我都会感到不舒服

translation.en: because how I grew up with this word
translation.zh: 在我的成长经历中

translation.en: is that it was a thing to not be talked about.
translation.zh: 这个词是禁忌

translation.en: It was a source of… of shame.
translation.zh: 提到就会感到耻辱

translation.en: [clicks teeth] Plantation is ours.
translation.zh: 种植园是我们的土地

translation.en: Don't make it a bad word
translation.zh: 别因为祖先曾在种植园被奴役

translation.en: because your ancestors were slaves on it.

可以看到一排排翻耕好的土壤

他们有个园地来…

translation.zh: 他们种番茄、养鸡 也猎兔

其中一个原因是
